products.title: Adidas 4DFWD 2 Running Shoes
products.description: The adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines evolution, combining the unique innovation of a pioneering 3D-printed midsole with a new upper structure and a Continental outsole for superior grip.

products.title: SNEAKERS ULTRABOOST 22
products.description: Probably the most comfortable running shoe we've ever made. Ultraboost 22 ensures a responsive run, whatever your training level or distance covered.

products.title: Nike Flex Experience Renew Shoes
products.description: A NEW FLEX WITH A NATURAL FEEL. Comfortably Zen, just like all running should be. In this Nike Flex Experience Run 11 Next Nature, we created a lightweight, clean design that's as comfortable as it looks.

products.title: Mizuno Frontier 13 Men's Running Shoes
products.description: Upper with modern fabric, which maintains the breathability of the feet during training, in addition to having Infinity Wave technology with long-lasting cushioning.

products.title: Men's Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature Shoes
products.description: Cheers to new beginnings between you and the sidewalks. Set the pace at the start of your run with the plush feel of the Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature.

products.title: Gray Slip On Tricot Sneakers
products.description: Platform sneakers in gray knit. Tennis is indicated for the practice of light sports, such as hiking and outdoor sports. The model features Calce Fácil technology, with a design that facilitates adapting the shoe to the ergonomics of the feet.

products.title: YUOOL FIT INDIGO
products.description: With a super soft midsole and a super light and resistant sole, the Yuool Fit was created to bring more comfort and free exercise from performance.

products.title: Sandals Hybrid City
products.description: The Havaianas Hybrid City is minimalist chic and very comfortable. In neutral colors, they have laminated fabric and soles and straps in contrasting tones.

products.title: Sandals Havaianas Hybrid City

products.title: MEN'S BOOTS ELIE VIBRAM AMIRI COGNAC
products.description: Élie has the purpose of uniting two forces: exclusive design and comfort, which is why our shoes are handcrafted in noble export-grade leather, including the inner lining and insole, for better sweat absorption.

products.title: SNEAKERS OLD SKOOL BLACK WHITE
products.description: Classic Old Skool is a low-top lace-up shoe featuring sturdy black canvas and suede uppers, a white leather sidestripe and white rubber side welts with reinforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, padded collars for support and flexibility and the brand's classic vulcanized rubber waffle outsole.

products.title: Lacoste Sneakers
products.description: Stylish to compose versatile and modern looks with a sporty touch on different casual occasions, the Lacoste Shoes are the right choice. Its structure is made of synthetic material with the iconic embroidered logo that enhances the look.
